attributes.background: Combat stress handing of puplic funds the discharge of patients, vetrens been told they cant get help.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

You might find it useful to know that it is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament to investigate alleged failings by charities. This is the responsibility of the Charity Commission.

You can find out how to make a complaint about a charity here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-charity

You might also like to sign this petition, calling for more Government mental health support and accommodation for veterans:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232414
